revised_title: Simultaneous Measurements of Stratospheric NO and NO2: A Study of Stratospheric Chemistry
tldr: This study presents simultaneous measurements of stratospheric NO and NO2 concentrations using a balloon-borne pressure-modulated radiometer. The authors describe the retrieval methods used to obtain concentration profiles and discuss the importance of nitrogen oxides in stratospheric chemistry. The findings contribute to a better understanding of the chemical processes occurring in the stratosphere and the role of nitrogen oxides in these processes.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Atmospheric Science
